cards.title: Ephemeral
cards.description: Lasting for a very short time; fleeting.
cards.exampleText: The beauty of the sunset was ephemeral, fading away within minutes.

cards.title: Sycophant
cards.description: A person who acts obsequiously toward someone important in order to gain advantage.
cards.exampleText: He surrounded himself with sycophants who constantly praised him, regardless of his actions.

cards.title: Halcyon
cards.description: Denoting a period of time in the past that was idyllically happy and peaceful.
cards.exampleText: She fondly remembered the halcyon days of her childhood spent by the seaside.

cards.title: Pernicious
cards.description: Having a harmful effect, especially in a gradual or subtle way.
